description: Love Parade Yarrow (Achillea sibirica subsp. camschatica 'Love Parade') is an incredible plant species. It is a unique hybrid strain, which has a dramatic color palette of exotic pinks, purples, and whites. This variety produces abundant flower clusters that are a real delight! Its long-lasting blooms are sure to add a pop of vibrant colors to your garden. This variety is also extremely resilient and cold hardy, making it suitable for a variety of climates and areas. The drought, heat and humidity tolerant perennial can even survive in dry soils, making it a great choice for gardens with less water supply. Love Parade is truly an amazing plant species that is sure to enhance your outdoor space!
